in.draft_feature_dsa00_text: Integrasi ini menambahkan sistem pasokan yang lebih baik, beberapa mobil layanan baru, jalan baru yang lebih cepat dan lebih murah, bencana baru, bendera DSA, bangunan baru, banyak acara, dimensi ruang untuk dijelajahi, metode baru untuk mendapatkan uang dan banyak lagi  lebih.
in.draft_dsa_zone_text: Zona untuk membuat Daerah DSA di kotamu
in.draft_dsaroad_text: Jalan yang lebih cepat dari biasanya dirancang oleh DSA.
in.draft_dsa_ultra_road00_text: Jalan cepat gila-gilaan yang dirancang oleh DSA.
in.draft_dsahq_text: Markas besar untuk semua operasi DSA di daerah tersebut.
in.draft_dsahqupHW_text: Membentuk departemen DSA untuk layanan darurat yang meningkatkan keselamatan publik dengan mengirimkan tim khusus.
in.draft_dsahqupAR_text: Membentuk departemen penelitian DSA yang menghadap pusat penelitian dan pangkalan di daerah tersebut.
in.draft_dsahqupMS_text: Membentuk departemen manajemen sumber daya DSA yang mengelola pengumpulan sumber daya di daerah tersebut.
in.draft_dsa_outpost00_text: Kantor DSA lokal dengan perwakilan paling berkualitas.
in.draft_tool_disaster_super_nuke00_text: ICBM DSA yang paling kuat mampu menghancurkan apa pun yang bersentuhan dengannya.
in.draft_dsa_icbm_marker_text: Suar yang digunakan untuk menandai target „X-treme“ ICBM
in.draft_dsaicbmarmed_text: Silo rudal DSA siap diluncurkan „X-treme“ ICBM.
in.draft_dsa_space_command00_text: Bangunan bertanggung jawab untuk semua operasi ruang DSA lokal.
in.draft_dsaresearch_text: Rumah bagi semua teknologi canggih DSA yang disetujui oleh dewan eksekutif DSA.
in.draft_dsar3_text: Meneliti sistem pasokan canggih eksperimental baru.
in.draft_dsa_research01_text: Penelitian cara-cara untuk mengandung organisme dan partikel.
in.draft_dsa_research02_text: Meneliti teknologi roket baru untuk mengeksplorasi dan menjajah benda angkasa lain di alam semesta.
in.draft_dsa_research03_text: Meneliti teknologi pembengkokan pikiran dan fisika.
in.draft_dsaclockstore_text: Tempat yang sangat tidak menarik untuk membeli jam Anda.
in.draft_dsadrill01_text: Tingkatkan kepala bor untuk menambang sumber daya lebih cepat dan lebih efisien.
in.draft_dsadrill02_text: Tingkatkan kepala bor untuk menambang sumber daya lebih cepat dan lebih efisien.
in.draft_dsahouse00_text: CEO DSA tinggal di sini dan memastikan DSA melakukan pekerjaannya.
in.draft_dsahouse01_text: Rumah besar DSA, pemimpin Domkisas, dan „Dewa“ sendiri.
in.draft_dsa_ja_mansion_template00_text: Keju kelas dunia dibuat untuk CEO DSA.
in.draft_ICBMarm_text: Tekan ini untuk mempersenjatai rudal balistik antarbenua ini.
in.draft_prison00_text: Tempat keras yang dirancang untuk menampung semua pelaku kejahatan.
in.draft_prison_upgrade00_text: Ajari para tahanan dasar-dasar hal-hal yang mengurangi kemungkinan mereka menjadi penjahat lagi.
in.draft_dsapower00_text: Energi dari fusi terbukti lebih efisien dan lebih bersih daripada energi lain, tetapi biayanya lebih mahal.
in.draft_dsapower01_text:
Antena yang digunakan untuk mentransmisikan daya dari Dyson sphere kembali ke Theonia menggunakan gelombang radio gelombang mikro. 

Catatan: daya yang dihasilkan berada pada tegangan tinggi.
in.draft_dsawater00_text: Menghasilkan air dari reaksi sintesis hidrogen dan oksigen.
in.draft_dsaicbmpad_text: Silo peluncuran rudal untuk rudal balistik antarbenua terbesar DSA yang pernah dibuat.
in.draft_dsacontainmentfacility_text: Fasilitas penahanan BSL-4 yang mengandung zat paling berbahaya yang diketahui manusia termasuk poccolovirus yang terkenal itu.
in.draft_dsawalls_text: Menawarkan perlindungan kebisingan dan polusi untuk warga Anda.
in.draft_dsacontainingwalls_text: Dinding yang tidak bisa dihancurkan dirancang untuk menahan benda-benda yang merusak di teluk.
in.draft_dsa_tree_destroyer_text: Mesin luar biasa yang digunakan untuk memotong pohon dengan uang tunai 50% lebih banyak.
in.draft_blackhole_dsa_text: Batas di mana tarikan gravitasi benda besar menjadi begitu besar sehingga membuat pelarian mustahil.
in.draft_blackhole_dsa_static_text: Sebuah wilayah dalam ruangwaktu di mana gaya gravitasi pasang surut menjadi tak terbatas.
in.draft_tool_disaster_gliu44_text: .Virus yang tidak diketahui asalnya yang menunjukkan sifat merusak yang gila
in.draft_gliu44_text: Virus yang tidak diketahui asalnya yang menunjukkan sifat merusak yang gila.
in.draft_gialodathomyle00_text: Strain mutasi geliumium yang menargetkan virus biasa.
in.draft_dsa_moon_drillingstation_template0: Bangunan untuk mengumpulkan dan memurnikan mineral lokal.
in.draft_dsa_moon_drillingstation_depleted_: Stasiun penambangan yang sudah tidak digunakan lagi
in.draft_dsarocket_upg2_text:
Wah Ada Kucing Di Dalam .
Readiness: ${_dsareadiness}/2500
in.draft_dsarocket_upg3_text:
Digunakan Agar Kita Tidak Tersesat.
Readiness: ${_dsareadiness}/3000
in.draft_dsarocket_upg4_text:
Benda Yang Terbang Tinggi Di Langit.
Readiness: ${_dsareadiness}/5000
in.draft_dsarocket_upg5_text:
Mencari Hal Baru Di Bulan.
Readiness: ${_dsareadiness}/15000
in.draft_dsarocket_upg6_text:
Pertahanan Roket Agar Tidak Di Serang Alien.
Readiness: ${_dsareadiness}/30000
in.draft_Olsken.LobbysCake_text:
Kue Dari Lobby!
Happy Birthday to Lobby!
in.draft_dsa_notify00_text: Hallo Di Sana, Saya CEO Dari DSA.
in.draft_dsa_notify02_text: Oh Tidak, Kita Harus Memperbaiki Kota Ini
in.draft_dsa_notify03_text: Hey Mau Bisa Membangun Bor Karena Ada Beberapa Mineral Keluar Dari Bumi
in.draft_dsa_notify04_text: Awas Akan Ada Virus Yang Datang.
in.draft_dsa_notify06_text: Bolehkah Aku Membangun Rumah Di Kotamu?.
in.draft_dsa_notify07_text: Ini di luar kendali kita...Waktuny meluncurkan protokol „Explosive Stop“.
in.draft_dsa_notify08_text: Inti kuantum mudah meledak. Kamu tahu, kan?
in.draft_dsa_notify10_text: Oh halo, Pak Hacker, kamu tidak keberatan dengan lubang hitam, kan?
in.draft__dsa_ask00_text: Pak Wali Kota, haruskah kita menyalurkan dana untuk pemulihan dari bencana jika semuanya gagal?
in.draft__dsa_ask01_text:
Roket sudah mencapai tujuan.
Maukah kamu melihatnya?
in.draft__dsa_ask02_text: Pagi Pak Wali Kota, bisakah saya membangun rumah di kotamu untuk saya tinggal?
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify00_text: Ini tempat yang gersang, tapi aku melihat beberapa deposit mineral yang bisa kita proses menjadi uang.
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify01_text: Sepertinya para kolonis kelaparan. Berikan mereka makan!
in.draft_dsa_bear_lua_notify00_text: Selamat ulang tahun dari kami dan komunitas Theotown! Semoga harimu baik!
in.draft_dsa_lua_notify00_text:
Dalam perjalanan eksplorasi ruang angkasa ini, kami telah mendeteksi tempat yang cukup besar untuk kita bisa mendarat.
Menguhubungkan dengan komando ruang angkasa...
in.draft_dsa_lua_notify01_text: Perjalanan eksplorasi kali ini tidak menghasilkan sesuatu yang menarik.
in.draft_dsa_lua_notify02_text: Ah, ya, oof, roket dalam jalur tabrakan dengan bumi...SELAMAT BERSENANG-SENANG!
in.draft_dsa_lua_notify03_text: Selamat Pak Wali Kota, kita telah mendirikan jaringan SDI di atas area ini. Ini akan melindungi kota dari meteor dan invasi UFO.
in.draft_dsa_lua_notify04_text: Selamat! Kita telah selesai membangun pencapaian yang hebat - Dyson sphere!
in.draft_moon_auto_deco00_text: Struktur Yang Entah Apa Yang Membuatnya.
in.draft_moon_artifact_ja00_text: Benda Yang Kita Tidak Ketahui Cara Kerjanya.
in.draft_dsa_research00_text: Research new experimental advanced supply systems.
in.draft_dsa_award00_text: Now where did this rock come from?
in.draft_dsadrill_text: Used for gathering valuable resources which are sold for a profit, however be aware of it having ability to cause earthquakes.
in.draft_dsa_drill_upgrade_no_earthquake_te:
Upgrade the station to gather resources without interfering with the enviroment.

Only one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify03_text: Oof, sorry for the rough landing. We had to adapt some tech to work on here.
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify04_text: As you also probably saw, I've transfered 10 million theons to build a small outpost.
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify05_text: Please spend the funds wisely as it's your only shot at this.
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify06_text: As for further funding, you may attempt exploiting those ore deposits.
in.draft_dsa_moon_notify07_text: Anyways, good luck, mayor! Remember, you can always return here by finding the map in your single cities list.
in.draft_dsa_moon_command00_text: Building commanding all local and space operations in the vacinity.
in.draft_dsa_moon_spaceport_text: Building which is used for easy transportation of goods, materials or people in space.
in.draft_dsa_moon_sport00_text: A place for colonists to remain fit and healthy.
in.draft_dsa_moon_faith00_text: Building for colonist faith and religion.
in.draft_moon_recycle00_text: A station where garbage is recycled back into usable objects or materials.
in.draft_moon_pipe00_text: Pipes used to transfer water to your local base.
in.draft_moon_water00_text: Make water out of bodily fluids of colonists or synthesis.
in.draft_moon_energy00_text: Convert solar energy to power to light up your base.
in.draft_moon_wire00_text: Wires used to transfer electricity underground to your base.
in.draft_dsa_moon_road00_text: Reinforced ground tracks for rovers and other vehicles.
in.draft_dsa_moon_farm_text: A building with artificial ecosystem designed for food production.
in.draft_dsa_helium3_upgrade_text: Export helium 3 back to Theonia for use in fusion reactors. You'd export enough Helium 3 for up to ${_spacehelium} power plants.
in.draft_dsa_dyson_upgrade_text:
Construct a megastructure around a star which would capture a large percentage of star's power output.
Microwave antenna will be required to receive power.
in.draft_dsa_moon_drillingstation01_text: Building for gathering and refining Helium 3.
in.draft_dsa_moon_drillingstation02_text: Building for gathering and refining Genericum.
in.draft_dsa_moon_drillingstation03_text: Building for gathering and refining Poccolonum.
in.draft_pidroid_remote_template00_text: Remote used for controlling the Pidroid.
in.draft_tool_pidroid_remote00_text: Build a remote to control the Pidroid.
in.draft_pidroid00_text:
One of the most intelligent and advanced robots ever made which runs on nuclear power.

NOTE: due to safety concerns, the AI has been removed from this model.
in.draft_picklebparty00_text02_text: You're never too old for a pickle
in.draft_picklebparty00_text08_text: Not knowing what I could do
in.draft_ranoutofmoney_notify00: I see you've ran out of money! I'm sending the last remaining allocated funds for this project. Spend them wisely!
in.draft_moon_artifact_upgrade00_text: Investigate the artifact and send the collected data back to HQ for a monetary reward.
in.draft_space_tree00_text: Some fake trees to keep the colonists happy.
in.draft_dsa_moon_pickle_rocket00_text: A huge rocket specifically designed to fit a lot pickles inside it.
in.moon_region_unsupported: Unfortunately, moon regions are not yet supported. The city will now close!
in.draft_space_storyline_cancel00: I'm sorry, I am unable to tell you anything of interest!
in.draft_space_storyline_busy00: I'm sorry, but I have nothing for you at this time.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro01: Please do not be afraid! We came here with peace.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro02: Well, crash landed would be more fitting.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro03: We trust you won't hurt us. Do we trust you right?
in.draft_space_storyline_intro_refused00: Very well. You may do whatever you want to us, however we won't tell you anything.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro_affirmed00: That's great. Allow me to introduce myself.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro_affirmed01: I am GenericGiantPickleLeader#01 - leader of the Cucumber galaxy.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro_affirmed02: All we need is a little help. In return you may have all our knowledge.
in.draft_space_storyline_intro_affirmed03: I'll tell you the exact details later, I need to rest now.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_2_00: You came back? Good, we thought you ran away!
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_2_01: We want to see if you have the willpower and what it takes for the task.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_2_02: Destroy all the mining stations which are destroying this fine place!
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_2_notdone: I can still see some mining stations running, come back again when they are all offline.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_3_00: I understand that you rely on those ores for resources...
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_3_01: But have you ever thought of investing in those strange structures, instead?
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_3_03: How about you give that a try, eh?
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_3_04: Come on, give researching artifacts a try!
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_4_01: We've come to realisation that I need some things...
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_4_02: Namely, Poccolonum, a very nice resources that we will use later.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_4_03: Just build a mining station on top of some of the green ore.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_4_04: We'll take the ore for our project ourselves.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_4_05: Don't be shy now, build a Poccolonum mine!
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_5_00: I am once again asking for your financial support
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_5_01: I need all of that thing you call theons.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_5_02: Can you give me all your theons?
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_5_02_refused: Too bad, hope you can change your mind later.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_5_03: Trust me, I'll put it to good use.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_7_00: I have one last favour, mayor
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_7_01: I assume you are familiar with rocket construction
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_7_02: Could you construct a rocket according to these schematics?
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_7_03: Being the generous pickle that I am, I've gotten all resources for it
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_7_04_notyetb: I see the rocket construction is still underway
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_8_00: I'm afraid this is the last time we're seeing each other.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_8_01: We are now ready to return to our home galaxy and rebuild it, provided that there's something left.
in.draft_space_storyline_stage_8_02: We will now hustle our way to the rocket.
in.draft_space_storyline_ending_00: Guess this is it. Thank you very much for helping us.
in.draft_space_storyline_ending_01: In return, we would like to give you this storage medium.
in.draft_space_storyline_ending_02: It contains all of our recorded knowledge.
in.draft_space_storyline_ending_03: Once you're ready, initiate the launch.
